description: Schema for stores data type - matches module-data-install stores.csv format. One row per store view.

site_code.description: Website code. May only contain letters (a-z), numbers (0-9) or underscore (_)

store_code.description: Store code. May only contain letters (a-z), numbers (0-9) or underscore (_)

store_root_category.description: Root category name. Will be created if it doesn't exist

is_default_store.description: Y if this is the default store for the website

store_view_code.description: Store view code. May only contain letters (a-z), numbers (0-9) or underscore (_)

is_default_view.description: Y if this is the default view for the store

view_is_active.description: Y/N - whether store view is active (default N)

theme_fallback.description: Fallback theme if primary theme doesn't exist (optional)
